about_the_game:
Machines have taken over the world. You are safe inside a bunker and the only way to “safely” access the outside world is to send your trusted RC battle bot. Use it to infiltrate the Machines’ research facilities and steal blueprints for new bot parts and weapons.

You can also fight other survivors’ bots in a series of arena matches.

Bring a friend for some online co-op action or put your reputation on the line in a 1 vs 1 deathmatch!

Key Features

Fast Paced Bot-on-bot Action


Test your bullet dodging and twin stick shooter skills and blast countless enemy bots while navigating a voxel style bullet hell environment.

Customizable Bots


Experiment with different combinations of parts and weapons. Discover the perfect balance between form and function for your ultimate fighting machine.

Arena Battles


Fight waves of enemies and defeat intimidating bosses in a progressive series of arenas!

Futuristic Dungeons


Speed through sci-fi-inspired dungeons and find new bot parts and weapons!

Online Multiplayer


Find players in the lobby for a variety of co-op or versus modes.

Follow the development, chat with the developers and join the playtesting crew on our Discord server:

Wishlist Mechanical Mayhem now so you don’t miss out when the game is released!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U CPU @ 1.60GHz 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Require Vulkan 1.0
